Room.Name: Hofton Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Hofton Avenue, which runs parallel to the northern City Walls.
Room.LongDescription: Looking up, you can see the massive City Walls on the north side of the road, protecting the people of Oceancrest from any invasion of any kind from any foe. Oceancrest has learned some hard lessons in the past, and is now always prepared for just about anything.
